alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Madison; Rankin (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 6:18PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Rankin, northeastern Hinds and south central Madison Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 618 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Flowood, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Ridgeland around 640 PM CDT. Madison around 645 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. High winds can bring down trees and large limbs resulting in serious injury or property damage. Exercise extreme caution when outdoors during such strong winds...and be especially aware of older trees. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
